document.full_text: though trailing most of the game, eighth-seeded george mason took advantage of several villanova miscues down the stretch to advance to the third round.
document.title: east: george mason 61, villanova 57: confident george mason improvises a comeback
lines_and_colors: though trailing most of the game, eighth-seeded george mason took advantage of several villanova miscues down the stretch to advance to the third round.
